constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

description: Erection of single storey outbuilding (summerhouse) to rear of property
decision_conditions: The proposed development would meet the criteria of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and would be lawful.

The applicant is advised that should protected species be found as a result of future development he/she must fulfil his/her duties under the Wildlife and Countryside Act 1981 (as amended) and the Conservation of Habitats and Species Regulations 2017 (as amended).

Please confirm and amend the description of proposed works on application form to reflect all of the works  eg. Erection of of a  three  storey building comprising of three 3 bedroom residential units , including associated private gardens and a communal garden "
